newsitem.title: UK: LME details Los Angeles/Long Beach location change.
newsitem.headline: LME details Los Angeles/Long Beach location change.

text.p: The London Metal Exchange (LME) said that following a board meeting on August 14 its locations at Los Angeles and Long Beach will be listed separately.
The change will be effective from November 1996.
In an Exchange notice the LME said the companies to be listed under Los Angeles are currently California Cartage Company Inc and Crescent Warehouse Company Ltd.
The comany to be listed under Long Beach is currently Metro International Trade Services Inc. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 8075
